content: One of the key differences I've noticed between Obama and Bush is that Obama has kept his mouth closed about these scummy pirates. He has not mentioned them, or even officially acknowledged them and he has not given them the status they seek of even being mentioned by the President of the United States. Such mention would elevate their status and give them the credibility they desire. This is something Bush was a master at, turning terrorists into big time world stage players by getting in the mud with them and practically calling them out personally. Obama is clearly not that stupid and he is letting the situation get handled at the appropriate level, which is NOT HIS. He's the President of the United States, and the President should not and ought not be dealing one one with a few pirates. Simple as that. Kudos to a real world leader, President Obama.

content: One of the key differences I've noticed between Obama and Bush is that Obama has kept his mouth closed about these scummy pirates. He has not mentioned them, or even officially acknowledged them and he has not given them the status they seek of even being mentioned by the President of the United States. Such mention would elevate their status and give them the credibility they desire. This is something Bush was a master at, turning terrorists into big time world stage players by getting in the mud with them and practically calling them out personally. Obama is clearly not that stupid and he is letting the situation get handled at the appropriate level, which is NOT HIS. He's the President of the United States, and the President should not and ought not be dealing one one with a few pirates. Simple as that. Kudos to a real world leader, President Obama.
